info.name: Kenali Diri - Career Profile E2E (With Edge Cases)
info.description: Postman Collection for E2E Testing of Career Profile modules: Recommendation, Fit Check, and Negative Scenarios based on Use Cases.

item.name: 1. SIKLUS A: Recommendation Flow
item.description: Alur sukses untuk mendapatkan rekomendasi profesi berbayar 3 token.

body.raw:
{
    "session_token": "{{recSessionToken}}",
    "dimension_name": "what_you_love",
    "selected_profession_id": 1,
    "selection_type": "selected",
    "reasoning_text": "Saya suka menganalisa data dan memecahkan ruang masalah kompleks untuk industri."
}

{
    "session_token": "{{recSessionToken}}",
    "dimension_name": "what_you_are_good_at",
    "selected_profession_id": 1,
    "selection_type": "selected",
    "reasoning_text": "Saya pandai koding Python dan mahir public speaking."
}

{
    "session_token": "{{recSessionToken}}",
    "dimension_name": "what_the_world_needs",
    "selected_profession_id": null,
    "selection_type": "not_selected",
    "reasoning_text": "Dunia butuh lebih banyak sistem ramah lingkungan."
}

{
    "session_token": "{{recSessionToken}}",
    "dimension_name": "what_you_can_be_paid_for",
    "selected_profession_id": 2,
    "selection_type": "selected",
    "reasoning_text": "Saya yakin bisa dibayar tinggi sebagai Data Engineer."
}

item.name: 2. SIKLUS B: Fit Check Flow
item.description: Alur cek kecocokan profesi target dengan gaya kepribadian via RIASEC shortcut.

item.name: 3. SIKLUS C: Personality Tabs
item.description: Pengambilan data spesifik kepribadian pasca RIASEC.

item.name: 4. NEGATIVE / EDGE CASES
item.description: Pengujian Use Case Alternatif untuk Validasi Backend Error Handling.

body.raw:
{
    "session_token": "{{recSessionToken}}",

    "reasoning_text": "Mencoba submit dimensi ini dua kali untuk trigger error."
}
